fact.translated: Remove the rice from heat when it is cooked so that it can absorb the remaining liquid.
fact.fact_aligned_sentence: 製作鐵鍋飯用的是專製的鐵鍋,鍋身淺而平。正宗的鐵鍋飯,要用橘樹樹枝生火在室外烹煮。先以橄欖油炒肉,再下蔬菜。然後下米使油滲入。再加入沸騰的上湯,調低爐火。飯熟時離火使飯吸收剩餘汁液。放涼數分鐘後即可食用。

tgt_fact_aligned_sentences: Some recipes call for paella to be covered and left to settle for five to ten minutes after cooking.
After cooking paella, a layer of scorched rice may be at the bottom of the pan, called socarrat in Valencià.
Originally, paella made in Valencia was a lunchtime meal for farmers and farm laborers.
Workers would gather what was available to them around the rice fields.
